meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lengthy.
meanings.sent1: The lengthinesses of the movie made it hard to sit through.
meanings.sent2: I was surprised by the lengthinesses of the line at the grocery store.
meanings.sent3: The lengthinesses of the meeting made everyone start yawning.
meanings.sent4: The lengthinesses of the journey seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The lengthinesses of the book made it feel like a marathon to finish.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being long or extended in duration or distance.
meanings.sent1: The lengthinesses of the road trip added to the adventure.
meanings.sent2: The lengthinesses of the marathon tested the runners' endurance.
meanings.sent3: The lengthinesses of the line at the amusement park made us reconsider our choice.
meanings.sent4: The lengthinesses of the tunnel made it feel like we were traveling through time.
meanings.sent5: The lengthinesses of the speech bored the audience to tears.
